description.text:
17 de noviembre a las 19 hs, en HIMALAYA VIAJES, Córdoba.
Charla informativa sobre el viaje para interesados y anotados al viaje .
 
INDIA: al sur de Asia, es el país de mayor población en el mundo tras China. Posee 23 idiomas oficiales y una gran riqueza cultural y natural.
Es denominado muchas veces como "el país de la espiritualidad" o "el país de los templos" y esto se debe a la enorme cantidad de templos que se encuentran diseminados desde el norte al sur del país recibiendo a miles de devotos de distintas religiones que se acercan para venerar a sus sagrados dioses. La India es cuna de 4 de las religiones más importantes del mundo: budismo, hinduismo, sijismo y el jainismo.
Los templos y su simbolismo, tienen muchísima importancia para sus habitantes y suelen ser más que lugares de peregrinación, son parte de su vida. La arquitectura de los mismos varía de acuerdo a la religión y localización de estos templos, lo que demuestra una gran diversidad de formas y estructuras.
UN VIAJE HACIA TU INTERIOR EN INDIA te brinda la posibilidad de realizar un viaje hacia el interior de ti mismo a la vez que viajas por este país lleno de colores, culturas diferentes, misticismo, contrastes…. Para que cada experiencia vivida se transforme en crecimiento interno.

del 01DE ABRIL DE 2017 al 23 de Abril , desde Córdoba.
SALIDA GRUPAL  ACOMPAÑADA con SILVIA G. VENARIA *
El propósito de este acompañamiento tiene que ver con:

         facilitar clases prácticas de yoga y/o meditación cada mañana antes del desayuno, lo que permitirá equilibrar y armonizar la energía para que la jornada se aproveche en su totalidad y también con
·         reuniones grupales a la noche, de manera tal que cada uno pueda expresar cómo está siendo su experiencia. Pero durante todo el día,
·         también estaré disponible para lo que tenga que ver con re-significar la experiencia que estén viviendo para transformar esa situación en una oportunidad de autoconocimiento y transformación interior.

La consigna de este viaje será reconocer que “realidad es la respuesta”, entender que cada situación que se presenta está para algo y que cambiando la perspectiva podremos conocer más de nosotros mismos, de nuestros condicionamientos, creencias, mandatos, mecanismos… que en general son los mismos que vivimos en nuestro día a día. Los conflictos que se presentan en nuestra vida podemos abordarlos de diferentes maneras, dependiendo la perspectiva que utilicemos y básicamente veremos cómo hacerlo, desde antes de iniciar el viaje hasta la finalización del mismo.
Para todo lo que tenga que ver con los lugares en sí, habrá guías locales de habla hispana.
ACLARACIÓN: las actividades propuestas de yoga y reuniones son sugerencias para quien se sienta llamado a realizarlas, pero si alguien quiere viajar como acompañante de otro pasajero  o porque le gusta la propuesta del itinerario, puede hacerlo y no participar de esas actividades, es bienvenido/a.
Algo de mi formación y experiencia en estos temas:
Profesora de Yoga desde el año 1991, de Hatha Yoga (diferentes escuelas) y Kundalini Yoga (desde 2005, certificación internacional de KRI Kundalini Reserch Institute). Coordinadora de Grupos de Meditación.
Terapeuta holística con formación en Rebirthing desde 1996 (con su creador: Leonard Orr y prestigiosos renacedores a nivel internacional), Constelaciones Familiares (en Centro Bert Hellinger 2006 a 2008 e Intensivo con Bert Hellinger en 2008), Gestalt (Centro Tendiendo Puentes, Cba. desde 2005 a 2008), Biología 

Total con Enrique Bourón (2010) y BioNeuroEmoción con Enric Corbera en Cuba (2012), Vidas Pasadas (con José Luis Cabouli en 2012), PNL (en 2011 y 2013)  entre otras.
Facilitadora de Procesos de Transformación Interior a través de sesiones individuales, talleres y retiros grupales, desde 2002.
Actualmente enfocada en dirigir talleres de Autoconocimiento y Transformación Interior basados en la Perspectiva Universal y Lógica Convergente, para un cambio de paradigma y desarrollo de La Lógica de los Conflictos, y toda la experiencia anterior.
A través de VIAJES INTERIORES, está la posibilidad de sumar el conocimiento exterior con el conocimiento interior para expandir la conciencia.
Más información en blog: http://silvia-graciela-venaria.blogspot.com.ar/
file:///C:/Users/Silvia/Downloads/Viaje-interior-a-India-01-de-abril-2017.pdf


Precio final por pasajero en base doble: USD 7260 (Incluye impuestos, gastos  e IVA)

Suplemente por habitación individual: USD 1200
Descuento por tarifa promocional de aéreos para reservas hasta el viernes 28 de octubre: USD 400
Importante: El trámite del visado de India está incluido en el precio así como el Arancel correspondiente.

Para cualquier información operativa dirigirse a :
HIMALAYA VIAJES info@himalayaviajes.com http://himalayaviajes.com/contacto/

Incluye:Total 18 noches de hotel.Alojamiento en habitación doble + desayuno diario. Pensión completa en Casa flotante, Alleppey.Las entradas en los monumentos.El show de luces y sonidos en Akshardham.Paseo en Rickshaw por el mercado Chandni Chowk, Delhi.Paseo en elefante en el fuerte de Amber, Jaipur.Paseo en Rickshaw por el mercado de Jaipur.Paseo en carrito de caballo desde la parada de autobús hasta la puerta de entradas a Taj Mahal en Agra (Tonga Ride).La danza de Kathakali, Cochin.Traslados, visitas / excursiones según programa para 10 - 14 pasajero en un auto bus mini de aire acondicionado (A/C mini Coach).Guías acompáñate de habla Castellana para todas las visitas y excursiones según el itinerario.Asistencia cada ciudades para el tiempo de ida y vuelta.Impuestos locales aplicados en estos momentos.El service tax de 4.50%.Vuelos internos: Delhi – Dharamshala, Amritsar – Delhi, Dehradun – Delhi, Jaipur – Bangalore y Bangalore. en clase económica. SUJETO A DISPONIBILIDAD A LA HORA DE LA RESERVA.Vuelos incluidos:01 ABRIL CORDOBA AEROPARQUE 0940 105501 ABRIL AEROPARQUE SAN PABLO 1535 182001 ABRIL SAN PABLO ABU DHABI 2205 1925 (02 ABRIL)02 ABRIL ABU DHABI DELHI 2200 0310 (03 ABRIL)22 ABRIL TRIVADRUM ABU DHABI 0420 0710 22 ABRIL ABU DHABI SAN PABLO 0835 1635 22 ABRIL SAN PABLO AROPARQUE 2325 0220 (23 ABRIL)23 ABRIL AEROPARQUE CORDOBA 0610 0735 No Incluye:Gastos personales como bebidas, propinas, visados, seguros, lavandería así como llamadas telefónicas.Cualquier otro servicio que no haya sido especificado como “incluido”.Se Requiere la vacuna de la fiebre amarilla.

OnBoard is a free full-day instructor-led enablement and training event that will provide you with a step-by-step technical introduction to the Google Cloud Platform (GCP). Through a combination of instructor-led presentations and technical demonstrations, you will learn how to get started with Google App Engine, Datastore, Storage, Container Engine, Compute Engine and Network, Big Data and Machine Learning. 
OnBoard has been designed for IT Managers, Systems Engineers and Operations professionals, Developers, Solution Architects and modern business leaders who are exploring cloud solutions or are new to Google Cloud Platform.

description.text:
In his first ever visit to India, former NASA physicist, consciousness explorer and author of the My Big TOE trilogy, Thomas Campbell presents this full day workshop based on his work which unifies physics and metaphysics, mind and matter, purpose and meaning, the normal and the paranormal into one scientific understanding.
Tom will talk about his TOE (Theory Of Everything) in a way that will be easy to understand both by existing supporters or by those new to his ideas and theories. Tom will speak directly to the deep spiritual traditions of India and how they fit perfectly into his model of reality.
Tom is very excited to be bringing his message of love and caring to India for the first time because a key element in Tom's work is "a complete understanding of why compassion is necessary for human evolution.
"One of today's hottest topics in the field of physics is the concept of virtual reality. Understanding virtual reality will help confirm your purpose here "because virtual reality takes the value out of material process and moves it to spiritual process."

virtual reality is the first step to a better paradigm
consciousness is the computer
love is the answer

Because Tom is unique in having a foot in both the world of physics and the world of consciousness exploration, he is perfectly placed to answer any question you may have on the day. Tom is thrilled to be visiting India, a country so rich in spiritual traditions. This will be a special opportunity for all!
For more information on Tom and his My Big TOE trilogy please visit www.mybigtoe.com
For more information on MBT Events please visit www.mbtevents.com
If you have any questions please don't hesitate to email keith@mbtevents.com
PRICE IS IN US$ AND INCLUDES TEA/COFFEE AND LUNCHTHIS EVENT REQUIRES PRE-REGISTRATION. THERE WILL BE NO TICKET SALES ON THE DOOR!

Digital Health Startups from India, are you ready to join the future? 
Are you ready to accelerate healthcare improvement through Mobile, IOT and other technologies? So are we! Join us at  FTR4H LAB & LOUNGE, Pragati Maidan, New Delhi.

What is on the program?

04:00 pm - 04:45 pm  Pitches for the FTR4H India Award04:45 pm - 05:00 pm judging process*05:00 pm - 05:15 pm Award Ceremony honouring Top 3 places05:15 pm - 06:00 pm Meet, Greet, Mingle with the Digital Health community
*The jury:

Dr Vishal Bansal – Investor, Mentor, Technology Enthusiast & Docpreneur  
Pradeep K. Jaisingh – Chairman HealthStart India
Mark Wächter – FTR4H Chief Evangelist & Mobile Strategist
Dr. Tarun Ramole – Digital Health Evangelist, Director Utilis Capital
Tjaša Zajc – FTR4H Global Audience Developer & Journalist


Learn more at: Digital Health Startups from India, are you ready to join the future? 

FTR4H: Digital Health futurists Reception is your chance to meet the FTR4H team, speak to decision makers, Venture Capitalists, Incubators, Accelerators. Listen and help the Hospitals, Clinical Institutes with your solutions. Enjoy drink and appetizer with your peers, formulate partnerships, and discuss ideas. We are even looking into rewarding disruptive Digital Health solutions from India. Interested? 
Call us on +91 97169 39792.
FTR4H (acronym for: Future for Health), is an international platform for Digital Health Aficionados on this planet: see www.FTR4H.org. It brings together entrepreneurs, visionaries, thought leaders working on transforming healthcare. FTR4H acts as a Think Tank and connector of Digital Health ecosystems in China, Europe, India, Israel and the US with the World of MEDICA.

Overview
Scaling Agile poses a different kind of challenge to enterprises of the day. It requires an understanding of Scaling Agile frameworks and best practices. Our  SAFe Agilist Training in Delhi is for executives, managers and Agile change agents responsible for leading a Lean-Agile change initiative in a large software enterprise.
Our current batch based is on SAFe 4.0.3
The two day training on Scaling Agile in Delhi validates their knowledge in applying the Scaled Agile Framework, lean thinking, and product development flow principles in an enterprise context so they can lead scaling Agile initiatives.
 
Prerequisites
1. 5+ years of experience in software development, testing, business analysis, product or project management
2. Scrum Experience
 
Certification Process
1. Register the course with required fee for the course
2. Attend the 2-day Leading SAFe Scaled Agile training by a SAFe Program Consultant
3. Pass the online SA exam by Scaled Agile Academy (The $100 fee is included in the training fee and we will take care of retake if that happens. )
 
Deliverables
1. 2 Days Scaled Agile Classroom Training
2. Free Access to Agile / Scrum E-learning Program

4. 15 Category C SEUs for CSP

6. Certification (SAFeAgilist) on successful completion of examination

description.text:
Do you understand the nuances of an agile coaching? What makes a high performing team and how an Agile coach a shape the future of a project.
Do you understand how to hold an effective conversation with your team in a non-threatening environment which promotes self growth and team harmony?
Do you wish to add Agile coaching skills to your profile which gives a new direction to your career?
The Agile Coaching mindset -
You need an agile mindset to be effective at agile coaching. Coaching is different from teaching, consulting or mentoring. It provides an environment to the coachee and the team to grow beyond a level. Coaching happens in an environment of trust, mutual understanding, respect and collaboration.
Are agile coaches in Demand?
Yes, the self organizing, customer centric agile teams are looking for coaches. Enterprises are moving deep into agile, now scrum teams and scrum of scrum teams are working on complex agile projects. The coach has an important role to play to build an environment of trust, respect and understanding.
The Indian IT industry is slowly realizing the value and need of coaching skills and, as a result, the demand of Agile Coaches is growing fast. Besides a possible need of technical or business expertise, Agile Coaches are expected to possess a unique set of behaviour skills like self-awareness and self-management, perspective taking, active listening, powerful questioning, facilitation, etc. After all, coaching is less about delivering results and more about building capability for self-learning and self-growth.
 
Is Agile coaching workshop best fit for you?
The 3-day Agile coaching (ICP-ACC) in Delhi is recommended if you are working as an Agile coach, scrum Masters, delivery manager or project manager of a traditional teams moving on to agile. If you aspire to be an Agile coach, ICP-ACC is a good start.
About ICagile coaching Certificate (ICP-ACC)
The (ICP-ACC) is a 3-day highly interactive classroom program in Delhi that make sample use of discussions and exercises to help participants hone essential coaching skills like self-awareness, coaching stance, mentoring, facilitation, active listening, powerful questioning and coaching for action.
Deliverable:
On successful completion, each participant will receive


A certificate titled “ICAgile Certified Professional in Agile Coaching” (ICP-ACC).


24 Leadership PDUs for PMI Certificate Renewal


24 Category B SEUs for CSP goal


Some of the key knowledge areas covered in this training include:


The Agile Coaching Mindset


The Coaching Stance


Professional Coaching Skills


Coaching Conversations – Coaching for Action


Mentoring Agile Roles & Transitions


Coaching the Journey toward High Performance


Handling Conflict and Dysfunctions within the Team


For more details about the training agenda, please view the Content Outline
For any query call on 9958297711 or mail at deepak.dubey@izenbridge.com 
ICP-ACC is although a new certificate, yet well recognized for the competencies of an Agile coach, companies like Capegemini and JP Morgan have already started asking for this certificate. Click on the links above to check this certificate listed in their open job positions.


Buy Now @ 35000+Tax

Are agile coaches in Demand?

Yes, the self organizing, customer centric agile teams are looking for coaches. Enterprises are moving deep into agile, now scrum teams and scrum of scrum teams are working on complex agile projects. The coach has an important role to play to build an environment of trust, respect and understanding.

The Indian IT industry is slowly realizing the value and need of coaching skills and, as a result, the demand of Agile Coaches is growing fast. Besides a possible need of technical or business expertise, Agile Coaches are expected to possess a unique set of behaviour skills like self-awareness and self-management, perspective taking, active listening, powerful questioning, facilitation, etc. After all, coaching is less about delivering results and more about building capability for self-learning and self-growth.

 

Is Agile coaching workshop best fit for you?

The 3-day Agile coaching (ICP-ACC) in Delhi is recommended if you are working as an Agile coach, scrum Masters, delivery manager or project manager of a traditional teams moving on to agile. If you aspire to be an Agile coach, ICP-ACC is a good start.

About ICagile coaching Certificate (ICP-ACC)

The (ICP-ACC) is a 3-day highly interactive classroom program in Delhi that make sample use of discussions and exercises to help participants hone essential coaching skills like self-awareness, coaching stance, mentoring, facilitation, active listening, powerful questioning and coaching for action.

Deliverable:

On successful completion, each participant will receive

  • A certificate titled “ICAgile Certified Professional in Agile Coaching” (ICP-ACC).

  • 24 Leadership PDUs for PMI Certificate Renewal

  • 24 Category B SEUs for CSP goal

Some of the key knowledge areas covered in this training include:

  • The Agile Coaching Mindset

  • The Coaching Stance

  • Professional Coaching Skills

  • Coaching Conversations – Coaching for Action

  • Mentoring Agile Roles & Transitions

  • Coaching the Journey toward High Performance

  • Handling Conflict and Dysfunctions within the Team

For more details about the training agenda, please view the Content Outline

For any query call on 9958297711 or mail at deepak.dubey@izenbridge.com 

ICP-ACC is although a new certificate, yet well recognized for the competencies of an Agile coach, companies like Capegemini and JP Morgan have already started asking for this certificate. Click on the links above to check this certificate listed in their open job positions.

description.text:
CIMS Medica presents the 6th edition of Indian Pharma Expo (IPE) 2017, scheduled to be held on 3rd - 5th August 2017, at Hall No. 7 E, F,G, Pragati Maidan, New Delhi.
IPE 2017 set another successful milestone with presence of visitors from all parts of India and provided a common platform for promising sellers and potential buyers from pharma and healthcare industries.
With IPE 2017, the benefits are bound to get augmented with presence of eminent personalities from various sectors of pharma, non-pharma and healthcare industries. It will gather representation from various companies like pharma manufacturers & marketers, packaging solution providers, machinery solution providers, franchise companies and many more under one roof.
IPE 2017 will be one point contact to exchange the business opportunities for National and International Pharma Companies. This event will prove to be a business expansion tool to many small-medium-major players in Pharma Industry.
